author: theblock.co
title: Fold secures $250 million equity purchase facility to expand BTC treasury
description: Fold holds approximately 1,488 BTC worth some $157.23 million, making it one of the largest publicly traded Bitcoin treasury firms.
content:
Fold holds approximately 1,488 BTC worth some $157.23 million, making it one of the largest publicly traded Bitcoin treasury firms.
This story appeared on theblock.co, 2025-06-17 13:55:41.
